And sure enough she did, said Kirsten Gillibrand . ''I was there when she was surrounded by her friends in the Congress and Senate. for president in 2012, has announced that he will NOT run for the White House: ''As reported by the Indianapolis Star, Mike Pence has circulated a letter to supporters announcing the decision.'' In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, wrote Mike Pence . ''We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.'' of course. Simon Cowell , Nigel Lythgoe had a lot to say about him as well as he talks about how the show was getting to dark with Simon Cowell 's constant nasty remarks to contestants. He goes on to say I think Steven Tyler and Jennifer Lopez are both stars in their own right. You forget that we've had this train wreck that was following Simon Cowell , and then Simon Cowell disassociated himself from the show over the last few years, turned his back on the strange people they brought in to judge. So I knew it was going to be better than people expected. He adds that the show has never been about Simon Cowell and he was the one person not worried when people told him to give up on Idol after Simon Cowell 's departure. left the door open to running for governor. ''In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana,'' Mr. Mike Pence wrote in a letter to supporters. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012. The decision of Mr. Mike Pence , which was first reported by The Indianapolis Star, ended weeks of speculation- and a draft movement- from conservative activists that he would join the field of prospective Republican contenders
